title: Scatterplots with descriptive statistics
text: Simple scatterplot  Scatterplot agreement metrics  Grouped scatterplot agreement metrics
code: library(dplyr) library(ggplot2) library(scatter)  # some fake data df <-  tibble(   observed = c(rnorm(150, 10, 2)),   predicted = observed + rnorm(150,0, 1),   group = rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each = 50)           )  scatter(df, observed, predicted) scatter(df, observed, predicted, add_metrics = TRUE) df %>%   group_by(group) %>%   scatter(observed, predicted, add_metrics = TRUE)

title: Calculate Agreement Metrics for Observed and Predicted Values — agreement_metrics
code: agreement_metrics(   data,   observed,   predicted,   add_overall = TRUE,   r2_method = c("sum_of_squares", "correlation") )

title: Calculate Agreement Metrics for Observed and Predicted Values — agreement_metrics
text: data data frame tibble containing observed predicted values, well grouping variables. observed name column containing observed values. Must unquoted (e.g., `observed`). predicted name column containing predicted values. Must unquoted (e.g., `predicted`). add_overall Logical, default `TRUE`. `TRUE`, additional row added overall metrics calculated entire dataset. r2_method character string indicating method calculating \(R^2\). Options `"sum_of_squares"` (default) traditional \(R^2\) based residual total sums squares, `"correlation"` square Pearson correlation coefficient observed predicted values.

code: # Example data set.seed(123) df <- data.frame(   group = rep(c("A", "B", "C"), each = 50),   observed = c(rnorm(50, 10, 2), rnorm(50, 20, 3), rnorm(50, 15, 4)),   predicted = c(rnorm(50, 10, 2), rnorm(50, 20, 3), rnorm(50, 15, 4)) )  # Simple scatterplot scatter(df, observed, predicted) #> Error in ggplot(data, aes(y = {    {        observed    }}, x = {    {        predicted    }})): could not find function "ggplot"  # Scatterplot with agreement metrics scatter(df, observed, predicted, add_metrics = TRUE) #> Error in ggplot(data, aes(y = {    {        observed    }}, x = {    {        predicted    }})): could not find function "ggplot"  # Grouped scatterplot with agreement metrics df %>%  group_by(group) %>% scatter(observed, predicted, add_metrics = TRUE) #> Error in ggplot(data, aes(y = {    {        observed    }}, x = {    {        predicted    }})): could not find function "ggplot"
